resources.string:
Lemizh time zone: LUT+%1$d min
minus phone’s time zone: UTC+%2$d min
plus LUT−UTC: +113 min

Total correction: +%3$d min

LUT = Lemizh Universal Time
UTC = Coordinated Universal Time
Go to lunar year (omit minus sign)

Welcome

This app provides, for no good reason, a real-time clock and calendar for the fictional Lemizh world, which is the home of my constructed language.

You can find out all about Lemizh at https://lemizh.conlang.org.

If you have any suggestions or questions, or you want to report a bug, or you just want to tell me whether you like this app, please contact me.
